issue.title: Wrong acceleration readings from IMU in rotors

content.raw:
Sorry @{5cf75629ff02b50ea27b2817} , you are correct, I had in mind the practice worlds which where released this month, still, I think that the time margin is quite low. Can you confirm that the IMU problem is indeed a bug? if so, how does it affect the urban qualification?

‌
